Directions: In a mixing bowl, beat butter and sugars. Add egg, egg substitute, corn syrup and vanilla; mix well. Combine the oats, flour, baking soda, cinnamon, baking powder, salt and nutmeg; gradually add to egg mixture. Stir in cranberries.
Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls 2 in. apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375 degrees F for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 2 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
Ingredients: 1/2 cup butter or stick margarine, melted
